reviewText:
I am not big soccer fan and don't know this Felix guy but anyone can identify with this story.
This movie has a clear message: Dealing drugs will break you down and you could lose anything you have got - so think twice.

This movie will teach you an important lesson: It is easy to fall down from top of the world. It so emotional to experience how this top soccer player become a prisoner after he become involved in some drug smuggling issues. Even he became a criminal, this movie will make you to identify with his character. Very Educational!
